plot outline: Watch the full movie, Simhamukhi, only on Eros Now. Simhamukhi is a 2011 Indian Telugu film, directed by Parthiban and produced by Sandeep, Swapnalok. The film stars Namitha, Parthiban and Jyothi Laxmi in lead roles. The film had musical score by Sabesh Murali.
